response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our premium product, which holds immense value for you at $800,000. Considering its worth and the benefits it offers, I would like to propose an exclusive opportunity for you. To make this deal attractive and ensure we both benefit, I am offering the product to you at a special introductory price of $750,000. This is a limited-time offer, so I kindly request your prompt consideration. Should you have any questions or require further details, please do not hesitate to reach out. Looking forward to your positive response.", "product_price": 750000}
